briefTitle: Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Brincidofovir in Treatment of Early Versus Late Adenovirus Infection
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Multicenter Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Brincidofovir (CMX001) in the Treatment of Early Versus Late Adenovirus Infection
summary: This was a Phase 3 open-label, non-randomized, multicenter study of oral brincidofovir (BCV) administered twice weekly for the treatment of adenovirus (AdV) infection detected during asymptomatic AdV viremia or during symptomatic AdV infection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With All-Cause Mortality
